para.text: The board of directors may remove an officer at any time with or without cause.

An officer of a limited cooperative association may resign at any time by giving notice in a record to the association. Unless the notice specifies a later time, the resignation shall be effective when the notice is given.

annoGroup.heading: Editor's Notes
annoGroup.annotation: Uniform Law: This section is based on § 823 of the Uniform Limited Cooperative Association Act. Edition
